concept: Binary tree traversals, height, diameter, BST operations and searching.

challenges.title: Preorder Traversal
challenges.description: Print preorder traversal of a binary tree.
challenges.inputDescription: Tree in level-order with -1 for null.

challenges.title: Level Order Traversal
challenges.description: Print level order traversal using queue.

challenges.title: Search in BST
challenges.description: Given a BST and a value X, print 1 if exists else 0.

challenges.title: Insert into BST
challenges.description: Insert X into BST and print inorder.

challenges.title: Delete from BST
challenges.description: Delete node with value X from BST and print inorder.

challenges.title: Lowest Common Ancestor
challenges.description: Given two nodes, find their LCA.
